net.minecraft.src
Interface BlockDeathInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlockCactus, BlockFlower, BlockMortal, BlockMushroom, BlockReed, BlockSapling, BlockTallGrass
public interface BlockDeathInterface

Specifies an interface for allowing blocks to die on a tick basis.

Method Summary

          Checks whether this block has starved on this tick by being surrounded by too many of it's kin
